titles.title: Medicaid Levy Enhancement Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a continuous levy on payments to Medicaid providers and suppliers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/10/2008--Introduced. Medicaid Levy Enhancement Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to impose a continuous levy on payments to Medicaid providers and suppliers for delinquent taxes owed by such providers and suppliers.
